text: jab ke tum paas wale kinare par thein aur wo door wale kinare par thein aur qafila tum se niche tha, agar tum aapas mein wade karte tuh yaqinan tum waqte mu-ayyan par pahochne mein muqtalif ho jate,lekin Allah ko tuh ek kam kar hee dalna tha jo muqarrar ho chuka tha,ta ke jo halak ho wo dalil par(yani yaqin jan kar)halak ho, aur jo zinda rahe wo bhi dalil par(haq pehchan kar) zinda rahe,beshak Allah bahuth sunne wala qoob janne wala hai
